ezvcard.io.json

Class JCardReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.io.StreamReader
      • ezvcard.io.json.JCardReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class JCardReader
extends StreamReader

    Parses VCard objects from a JSON data stream (jCard format).

    Example: 

     File file = new File("vcards.json");
 JCardReader reader = null;
 try {
   reader = new JCardReader(file);
   VCard vcard;
   while ((vcard = reader.readNext()) != null){
     ...
   }
 } finally {
   if (reader != null) reader.close();
 }
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt
    See Also:
    RFC 7095
